item.title: Conclusion & Destroy AWS Resources
item.description: Congratulations! Now you have concluded this workshop about How to build a Smart home Skill. For destroying resources, please check the below. Destroy Device Binding UI Go to Cognito User Pool Console Select the User Pool created Click Domain name on the left side bar Click Delete domain, select the checkbox and confirm to delete Go to AWS Amplify Console Select the Amplify APP
